title: 《幫加拿大手足轉載》旅加港裔和勇大召集！

replies.msg:
新香港文化協會成立宣言

在香港「反送中」抗爭運動中，為抗惡法、爭取民主自由，香港的年輕人奮不顧身，與警察和黑社會浴血街頭，他們面對催淚彈，橡膠子彈、布袋彈，被捕、被打、被虐、被性侵、被失蹤、被殺害。我們在加拿大的香港人，每天看著一幕幕震撼和血腥的場面，感到極度哀傷、難過和悲憤！

為了長期支援香港市民繼續抗爭，加拿大三大城市的香港人分別成立「多倫多新香港文化協會」、「溫哥華新香港文化協會」和「卡加利新香港文化協會」。


我們的使命是：本着關懷香港之心，聚集志同道合的朋友，共同努力為香港的未來而奮鬥。

我們的宗旨是：支持香港市民爭取民主自治、守衛和發揚香港文化。

我們的目標是﹕推廣香港本土文化﹔遊說加拿大政府及各政黨支持香港市民正義抗爭﹔爭取加拿大主流民意支持﹔定期集會聲援香港﹔籌款資助香港抗爭運動﹔運送救援及防預物資去香港﹔支援抗爭義士及協助尋求政治庇護等。

光復香港，時代革命！不只是口號，而係生活！

英文版

Statement from New Hong Kong Cultural Club:

The 'Anti-Extradition to China' legislation movement in Hong Kong has transformed into a huge political movement. To fight against this evil law, plus also restoring democracy and freedom. The Youths of Hong Kong are willing to sacrificing their own lives, and battling with the Hong Kong Police, Triads and pro-Beijing supporters at every street corners. They often facing white terrors with weapons such as tear gas canisters, rubber bullets, bean bag rounds, pepper sprays, lethal chemical dyes from water cannon trucks, batons and even live bullets. Also, they are brutally beaten, arrested with no justifications, insulted and humiliated, raped, disappeared without a trace and killed. We, as Canadian - Hong Kongers, watched these horrific and gory events constantly showing live. We bear the extreme sorrow, pain, and anger anyone could imagine.

To support these freedom loving warriors in Hong Kong in the long run, Canadian Hong Kongers in three major cities are organizing a Non-Profit Organization. 'New Hong Kong Cultural Club - Toronto', 'New Hong Kong Cultural Club - Vancouver', 'New Hong Kong Cultural Club - Calgary'.

Our Mission is: To care for the well-being of Hong Kong. We will gather the like-minded friends all over, standing united together and fight for Hong Kong's future.

Our goal is: To support Hong Kongers' quest to regain full rights and democracy, safe-guarding and promoting our Hong Kong Culture.

Our target is: To support local Hong Kong Culture. Convincing Canadian government of all levels and parties to support Hong Kongers' righteous fight for democracy. Promoting the awareness and fighting for support with Canadians. We will periodically holding peaceful rallies to support Hong Kong's fight for democracy. As well, we will do fundraising to support this worthwhile cause. In addition, we will send necessary supplies and equipment to Hong Kong, and other vital needs to our freedom loving warriors.

'Free Hong Kong! It is the Revolution of our times!' are not merely just slogans. They live within us everyday!
